full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Tender Title (English)**: Temporary Help Services for Computer Application Support - National Capital Region (NCR)
**Tender Title (French)**: Besoin en services d’aide temporaire - Soutien des applications informatiques - Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

**Tender Reference Number**: cb-250-23058858
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: S4764177
**Publication Date**: 29 January 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: 1 February 2024 3:00:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date**: None
**Expected Contract End Date**: None
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Services Required**
The Government of Canada, Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services for computer application support in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Eligible Suppliers**
Only supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870, who are qualified under the following streams and categories: 5.1- Computer Application Support, are eligible to submit a proposal.

**Invited Suppliers**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
1019837 Ontario Inc.
ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc.
Cofomo Inc.
Contract Community Inc.
Dare Human Resources Corporation
Green PI Inc
Maverin Inc.
PRECISIONERP INCORPORATED
S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
TRM Technologies Inc.
Turtle Island Staffing Inc.
Watershed Information Technology Inc.

**Security Requirement**
A Secret level of security is required for this requirement.

**Contact Information**
For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO-G TemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G daidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca or call (613) 971-7955.

**Attachments**
The tender document is available on the [official website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30561/s4764177---rfp.pdf).

Please note that this tender has expired.
